asset.name: empasiprubart
asset.one_liner: First-in-class C2 complement sweeping antibody targeting MMN and CIDP with potential for combination with VYVGART

target.name: C2 (Complement Component 2)
target.pathway: Classical/lectin pathway → C2 cleavage → C3 convertase formation → complement activation

biology.simple_explanation: C2 is a key component of the classical and lectin complement pathways. Empasiprubart uses a 'sweeping' mechanism to bind C2 and accelerate its clearance, providing sustained inhibition of complement activation upstream of C5 inhibitors.
biology.mechanism_differentiation: Upstream C2 inhibition vs downstream C5 blockade (eculizumab, ravulizumab)
biology.sweeping_mechanism: Antibody binds C2 and accelerates degradation for sustained complement suppression

why_good_target.clinical_validation: Complement activation implicated in MMN, CIDP, and other neurological diseases
unmet_need: MMN has zero approved targeted treatments
60% of MMN patients progress despite IVIg treatment
40% of MMN patients initially misdiagnosed (often as ALS)
C2 deficiency is generally well-tolerated in humans

lead.name: Multifocal Motor Neuropathy (MMN)
lead.rationale: Zero approved targeted treatments; 60% progress on IVIg; >$1B market by 2030

expansion.name: CIDP
expansion.rationale: Second MOA after VYVGART; potential combination or sequential use

expansion.name: MG Combination
expansion.rationale: Efgartigimod + empasiprubart combination for enhanced efficacy

phase_2_results.trial: ARDA Phase 2 + ARDA+ Open Label Extension
phase_2_results.key_finding: Sustained improved grip strength through 64+ weeks
phase_2_results.cohorts: EMP-EMP Cohort 1, EMP-EMP Cohort 2, PBO-EMP Cohort 1, PBO-EMP Cohort 2

catalysts.what_to_watch: Head-to-head vs IVIg; first Phase 3 for empasiprubart
Second molecule in CIDP; combination potential with VYVGART

investment_analysis.probability_of_success: Phase 2 de-risked; Phase 3 head-to-head vs IVIg
investment_analysis.peak_sales_estimate: >$1B in MMN alone; additional upside from CIDP
key_risks: Head-to-head trial vs IVIg is challenging design
Compound mutation market may be smaller than total addressable

market_opportunity.mmn_unmet_need: 40% misdiagnosed, 0 targeted treatments, 60% progress on IVIg, 20% severe disability
market_opportunity.cidp_opportunity: 42K diagnosed US patients; second MOA after VYVGART
